name: Constellar Express
description:
This game is all about defending your own star by intercepting enemy meteors, and to take over enemy stars to deal damage.

Fight your way through the carriages and defeat the driver waiting at the end of the train.

Take advantage of the shrines you encounter along the way to carefully choose your upgrades.

The game is played entirely with a mouse. Click on adjacent stars to move to them.

You've been sent by Dorado, the god of sea travel, to destroy the famous trainline owned by rival god, Argo Navis, before it ruins the sea travel business.
